english: It was you who came to me for help.

context_text_excluding_formality: I am talking to a woman.

english: What do you know about him anyway? Except he was one of your lousy cops!

context_text: I am having a formal conversation with a man.
context_text_excluding_formality: I am talking to a man.

english: Look, I could send a thousand threats, but Kirby made me realise your love for me would always defeat them.

english: I nailed the windows because you're not right.

english: You shook hands on the deal yourself with Mr. Capshaw. It was a gentlemen's agreement.

english: Tell me, damn it!

english: Sorry, I didn't mean to scare you.

context_text_excluding_formality: I am talking to a woman.

english: Well, you should have said before, Glenn, because I've got a file about that fucking thick ofthat back in the office.

english: And the way you got out, lying to yourself that the past held no sway over the future.
